c74object.name: sdt.pitch~
c74object.digest: Sound analysis: NSDF (Normalized Squared Difference Function) based pitch detector.
c74object.description:
sdt.pitch~ is an analysis tool which returns the pitch in Hz (leftmost outlet) and the pitch clarity (rightmost outlet). For voice-driven applications, sdt.pitch~ can be coupled with the skewness descriptor available in sdt.spectralfeats~, in order to have a higher level representation of the phonation vocal activity.
For better results, the vocal sound is meant to be pre-processed with sdt.demix~, in order to feed sdt.pitch~ and sdt.spectralfeats~ with the harmonic component only.

metadatalist.metadata: Stefano Delle Monache, Stefano Baldan, Stefano Papetti

objarg.name: window-size
objarg.digest: Window size, in samples. Default is 4096.

entry.name: float
entry.description:
Outlet 0: Detected pitch, in Hz.
Outlet 1: Pitch clarity [0.0, 1.0].
